head.title: Rotate {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to rotate pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Easily manage PDFs, Word files, Excel sheets, PowerPoint slides, images, archives, and more.

header.title: Page rotation in {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances {{EnvNameShort}} applications by adding advanced document processing features. Rotate pages in {{FileFormatUp}} files and work with popular business formats effortlessly.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a comprehensive document processing library that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. It provides tools for merging, splitting, extracting, rearranging, and deleting pages, enhancing document handling in your applications.

more_features.title: Powerful document content management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} includes a wide range of features, enabling efficient processing of over 50 commonly used business file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge different file formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, presentations, spreadsheets, Visio diagrams, images, and archives. Use various options for precise output.

feature_2.title: Manage document pages
feature_2.content: Rearrange pages by moving, swapping, or deleting them to structure your documents better.

feature_3.title: Adjust page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between portrait and landscape orientations.

feature_4.title: Extract pages as separate files
feature_4.content: Select a single page or a page range and save it as a new file in a chosen location.

formats.title: Rotate pages in multiple formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, allowing you to modify documents easily using a variety of operations.

operations.title: Key features
operations.description: Explore the powerful features provided by our document processing library.

examples.comment_1: Create an instance of {{NameProduct}} and load the source file
examples.comment_2: Specify the page number to rotate
examples.comment_4: Save the output file to the desired location

content.title: With [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}), you can easily rotate pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents, adding powerful document management capabilities to {{EnvName}} applications.
content.step_1: Define the source path of the {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_2: Select the page number to rotate.
content.step_4: Save the modified file to your preferred location.

code_1.title: Rotate all even-numbered {{FileFormatUp}} pages
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to rotate all even-numbered pages in a {{FileFormatUp}} document.
code_1.comment_1: Load the source file into the constructor
code_1.comment_2: Get the total number of pages in the document
code_1.comment_3: Configure rotation settings for even pages (180 degrees)
